channel.title: Marc Scape - closed
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/o6jne9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i884.photobucket.com/albums/ac47/tonyboloney2/Untitled-1copy-1.png[/img] Credits to gangsta tony for second banner If you can make me a better banner please do :P
[size=14pt]PM ME TO PLAY THE BETA[/size]
Also the server name will be changed to MTP after beta stages because I dont naming the server after me.
Ok so our goal for this server is a custom based server with all skills working. So far all skills work 100% EXCEPT: -Summoning which is about 60% done (still need dismmising and storing) -Hunter which is about 5% done -Construction which isnt even started
Credits to bainscape for summoning npc animations. I am also hoping Rachel Will let me be world 2 or something for bainscape.
Marc Scape will be 24/7 hosted by me. I plan on having a webclient after the client is completed so I dont have to keep re jarring it.
The people I need are people who can help me out with skills and gfx. I need some customs added better (attacking methods and such) and Im kinda stumped for summoning dismissing and storing and hunter and construction will be difficult. Also I need some people good with interfaces and all around client coding.
Apply using this:
Name: Age: Coding Experience: What Can you code for us:
Beta testers for the server are all welcome :) Just pm me If you want to beta test
Just Incase you need pictures here are some [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/so9sls.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2aakqxd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/33avsja.png[/img]
Add my msn: marcisboss@hotmail.com

item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Epicskillz:

BainScape FTW, And i really hope Rachael lets you use this as a World 2 Kinda thing, will be soo epic. Ill Be happy to be a beta tester if you want;

Alright bro Im prolly gonna start hosting this weekend but you can test for sure. Me and rachel didnt get off to the best start but I hope she lets me

And Lildude i know your pro coder so you can help me out

Read full topic

item.title: Marc Scape - closed
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

Name: lildude783
Age: 14
Coding Experience: 6 months
What Can you code for us: Anything.

I can also get some of my gfx ppl to draw u up a nice banner.

and if u want construction your gonna need a form of mapdata.

Thats the reason for mapdata, is to make things like jad cave, construction, area’s in the game where no one else can get into except for your one player.

Otherwise construction will be multiplayer and more like a i built a house here, you built a house there, stay off my lawn type of thing…

Read full topic

item.title: Marc Scape - closed
item.dc:creator: @Epicskillz Epicskillz
item.description:
@Epicskillz wrote:

BainScape FTW, And i really hope Rachael lets you use this as a World 2 Kinda thing, will be soo epic. Ill Be happy to be a beta tester if you want;

Name: Connor
Age: 14
Coding Experience: I have been Playing And Coding RSPS’ for a long time now, i had a break and now i’ve come back. I have hosted a few servers in the past such as EpicScapee and SkillzZScape, with a decent amount of players, a few dedicated ones. I Can code more than basics, im willing to learn and defiently quick to learn. I Have a lot of friends who have a lot of coding Experience who have helped me over the years. I Remember a long time ago, my Bro Helped me create and host a RSPS, one of the ones where you spawn In Varrock and Click haybales, doors and dummies for exp. Overall, i would love to help code, and if this gets declined i would love to be a tester

Also i have added you on Msn (Connormarcus@hotmail.co.uk) And i will be able to get you in a Mw2 Tenth lobby very soon, Dont worry im not blackmailing you aha.

PS. I Will Make a better banner, do you want MarcScape or MTPScape?
Finally, i <3 The Summoning models

Read full topic
